department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of vehicle body repair services for vehicles at Garrison Petawawa, Ontario.
description: The purpose of this standing offer is to establish a RISO for the provision of all labour, materials, supervision, transportation and equipment for vehicle body repair resulting from accidents and/or corrosion. This standing offer may result in the issuance of up to two (2) Regional Individual Standing Offers.
full_summary:
**Vehicle Body Repair Services Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Contract Title**
----------------

RFSO W0107-22M003: Paint - Vehicle Body Repair

**Contract Description**
----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the provision of Vehicle Body Repair Services.

**Background**
------------

The Government of Canada intends to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide all labour, materials, supervision, transportation, and equipment for vehicle body repair resulting from accidents and/or corrosion. This includes metal/fiberglass repair, replacement of body panels, paint, and refinishing.

**Key Deliverables**
------------------

* Metal/fiberglass repair
* Replacement of body panels
* Paint and refinishing services
* Transportation and equipment provision for repairs

**Bid Submission Requirements**
-----------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by **2023-03-08 at 1400 EST**. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Important Dates**
------------------

* Bid Submission Deadline: 2023-03-08 at 1400 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-03-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-03-01

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This solicitation is open to bidders who are eligible under various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For more information, please contact Darlene Keenan, PSPC/SPAC at **darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.  Latest revision date: 2023-02-20
